myProjects.name: Developer Profile Website
myProjects.description: Creating my personal web presentation with portofolio of my IT developer projects. Most of content is dynamicly loaded from .json file and composited by JavaScript.

myProjects.name: Development Notes
myProjects.description: My personal syntax notes help with projects development. It contain every interesting peace of code I used in my projects.

myProjects.name: Gas Calculator
myProjects.description: My first JavaScript project. It counts trip price according to trip distance, gas price and vehicle consumption.

myProjects.name: Node.js Playground
myProjects.description: Practise excercise with node.js, lodash, json data file. Using .map, .filter, forEach, .sum etc.

myProjects.name: Z Score Calculator
myProjects.description: Statistical app for calculation of Z-score. Commercial project for website about statistic.

myProjects.name: Z Score Convert Calculator
myProjects.description: Extension calculator for Z Skore parameter. Convert Z Score to other well-known statistical parameters.

myProjects.name: one-click-more-link
myProjects.description: Click only to one button on your website and open more new tabs in web browser. It is especially useful in affiliate, when visitor clicks on one link button and open website from more advertisers. This code hack Google Chrome restriction about multiply link.

myProjects.name: Affiliate Sites
myProjects.description: High profitable affiliate websites. Focused on specific product niche. Content is formed by comparing tables and lots of long product reviews. It is based on Hugo static generator (originally on Wordpress) and design is styled by own css (no predefined themeplate). There is a height level of SEO and linkbuilding used to get visitors from SERP. Also smart UX leads to high click-through rate on affiliate links.

myProjects.name: Pro-vital.cz
myProjects.description: Company website presentation based on goHugo static generator and getBootstrap. Beta version is hosted in Firebase. SEO for main keywords is optimized and ranking 1# on google.

myProjects.name: Eshop vasekravaty.cz
myProjects.description: Eshop with ties and bow ties. Eshop is based on rented eshop-rychle platform but there is lots of own design modification via css. There are used some own scripts (tie color navigation, price benefits, redirect to homepage). Project focuses on high quality SEO + linkbuilding and visitors from SERP.
